item.title: Delete And Successor
item.description: Problem Given a sequence a number $S={1…n}$ and a sequence of operations which contain two types of operation: delete and query. delte(x) delete x from the sequence and query(x) return the successor of the $x$ in the sequence. Solution Union-Find. When delete(x), union the subtree where $x$ in and the subtree $x+1$ in. The operation can be viewed as a fold operation which fold the $x$ and $x+1$. When query(x), return the find(x+1).
